NFTwow

NFTwow was a customizable, component-based website template for Figma, designed for NFT and art-related startups. Released to the Figma community in 2022, the template received thousands of downloads in its first week and was also developed into an accompanying website theme by a community member. It was later retired in order to focus on other personal projects.
